General.Name: CBI Co. Ltd
General.Description: CBI Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells car parts in South Korea. Its products include valve tappets, hydraulic tensioner housings, fixture injectors, TM parts, levers, Eegr base products, insert chambers, valve seat rings, piece an engagement product, and bearing journals. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
